title: Break Threejs camera into new component
message_prompt: Split my camera out into a new component in Camera.js just called Camera and import/use it in App.js. Keep everything else the same.
message_edit:
I will create a new component called Camera in a file named Camera.js and then import and use this new Camera component in App.js.

Steps:
1. Create Camera.js with the Camera component.
2. Import the Camera component in App.js.
3. Replace the camera setup in App.js with the new Camera component.
